segments.text: How much are you planning to buy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's not how much , but what I'm going to buy that matters . I'm going ski shopping !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . The front seat folds down all the way so there's just enough space for the skis ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But not enough space for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not unless you lose about 100 pounds ...
segments.speaker: S2
